title: Super Excited for the new Zyra Skin, so I made a short little animated intro for my stream!
body: I am a SUPER novice, I got a copy of Sony Vegas Pro and was just fiddling with it, I am super excited for the new skin XD  Just wanted to share thats all. I put together a few others for friends just for kicks. I know they are not professional or anything I was just screwin around XD
